info.title: @tartware/core-service API
info.description: Core platform APIs for tenants, reservations, rooms, billing, and super-admin operations.

post.summary: Authenticate a user and return a JWT
Start MFA enrollment for the authenticated user
Verify MFA code and enable MFA
Rotate MFA secret for the authenticated user

get.summary: List the tenants available to the authenticated user

get.summary: Get a single reservation by ID with folio and status history
Pre-check-in guest recognition brief (VIP status, preferences, alerts, loyalty)

Revenue forecast (scenario-based projections with confidence intervals)

get.description: Retrieve allotments (room blocks) for group bookings, events, and contracts
Retrieve detailed information about a specific allotment
Retrieve booking sources (OTAs, GDS, direct channels) with performance metrics
Retrieve detailed information about a specific booking source
Retrieve market segments with segmentation data, behavior metrics, and rate strategies
Retrieve detailed information about a specific market segment

Retrieve detailed information about a specific channel mapping
Retrieve corporate clients, travel agencies, and business partners

Retrieve detailed information about a specific waitlist entry
Retrieve group and block bookings with pickup tracking

get.description: Search available room types for a property and date range. Returns room types with availability count, base and dynamic rates.
Get a detailed rate quote for a specific room type and date range. Includes nightly breakdown, promo code application, and tax estimate.

post.description: Create a confirmed reservation through the direct booking engine. Validates guest and room type, applies promo code, and returns confirmation.
